A quantity document indicate neovascularization promote VEGF main cause visual acuity decline . Patients starve new drug notably improve VA less administration frequency lower treatment cost . The new drug Recombinant Human VEGF Receptor-Fc Fusion Protein ( KH902 ) gene fusion protein . The pre-clinical research phase II study show KH902 well-tolerated , safe , effective inhibiting growth , migration , pullulation vascular endothelial cell neovascularization induce VEGF . This study design prove confirm efficacy safety multiple injection KH902 patient choroidal neovascularization due neovascular age-related macular degeneration compare intravitreal injection KH902 sham-injections .
